content: CFS-MSL Modular Fire Sleeve Modular fire-rated cable pathway for optimal flexibility, cable capacity needs and retrofit ability ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Firestop devices and sleeves- - - ### FEATURES:Features Highest cable capacity – our largest pre-formed, fire-rated cable pathway for low-voltage installations Always retrofittable thanks to symmetrical half-shell design – no destructive steps involved Can be easily ganged in any combination of modular sleeve sizes Suitable for sustainable construction – Hilti fire sleeves use mechanical assembly techniques Easier and more reliable grounding thanks to simple-to-access grounding tabs on each frame Applications Firestopping low-voltage cable penetrations for single and cable bundles Small- to medium-sized rectangular openings in walls, ceilings and floors Ideal for frequent cable moves and additions For use in concrete, masonry and drywall ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Ultimate Application temperature range: 23 - 122 °F Storage and transportation temperature range: 23 - 122 °F Technical Data | Product Class | Ultimate | Application temperature range | 23 - 122 °F | Storage and transportation temperature range | 23 - 122 °F | Temperature resistance range | -7 - 167 °F ### ITEMS- 2337061 - Firestop sleeve CFS-MSL L 6x4 - Package Size 1 pc - 3805994 - Firestop sleeve Large & Large frame - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x CFS-MSL L 6x4 Firestop sleeve - 1x Flange Kit CFS-MSL P L 6x4 (qty2) - 2337060 - Firestop sleeve CFS-MSL M 3x4 - Package Size 1 pc - 3805993 - Firestop sleeve Medium & Medium frame - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x CFS-MSL M 3x4 Firestop sleeve - 1x Flange Kit CFS-MSL P M 3x4 (qty2) - 2337019 - Firestop sleeve CFS-MSL S 3x2 - Package Size 1 pc - 3805982 - Firestop sleeve Small & Small frame - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x CFS-MSL S 3x2 Firestop sleeve - 1x Flange kit CFS-MSL P S 3x2 (qty2)
